About me

A passionate data engineer who is capable of multiple roles and loves to work in challenging environment focussed on cutting edge systems

As an aspirant data engineer, I have reached great milestones in the past 2+ years. I have designed and developed scalable big data processing pipelines using distributed computing systems like apache spark. I have created ETL workflows to extract data from different sources, transform it into a standardized format and load it into data warehouse for further analysis. I have built customer 360 profile which gives a complete view of a customerâ€™s data and snapshots of the customer activity including every interaction they made with the system and it is used by the ML team to train their models and gives insights about sending personalized offers to the customer. I have also designed and built the data model for customer mdm and designed the data privacy and security layer in Azure. I have worked on cloud services like Amazon Aws and Microsoft Azure

I am a creative, detail oriented and versatile person. I am a great team player and well organised with proven skills in project management and team leadership.
